name: WellRounded 3
description:
Update of style 666 to Firefox 3. See style 666's page for a description.

If you are using Glasser, you don't want this style. Check out style 7065.

Recent changes
• 1.0.3 Fixed Vimperator status line.
• 1.0.3pre5 Fixed the find box colour issue reported by user 6573.
